mapper.insert: INSERT INTO promotion(promotionId , memberId ,advertisingId , subject, imageFilename, regDate, postingStatus) VALUES (promotion_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{advertisingId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subject}, #{imageFilename}, SYSDATE, 1)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM promotion p JOIN member2 m ON p.memberId = m.memberId
AND postingStatus = 1

SELECT promotionId, p.memberId, m.name, advertisingId, subject, imageFilename, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), postingStatus FROM promotion p JOIN member2 m ON p.memberId = m.memberId
AND postingStatus = 1
ORDER BY promotionId DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT promotionId, p.memberId, m.name, advertisingId, subject, imageFilename, regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd', postingStatus FROM promotion p JOIN member2 m ON p.memberId = m.memberId WHERE promotionId = #{promotionId} AND postingStatus = 1

SELECT promotionId, subject, postingStatus FROM promotion p JOIN member2 m ON p.member_id = m.member_id
AND (promotionId > #{promotionId}) AND postingStatus = 1
ORDER BY promotionId ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT promotionId, subject, postingStatus FROM promotion p JOIN member2 m ON p.member_id = m.member_id
AND (promotionId < #{promotionId}) AND postingStatus = 1
ORDER BY promotionId DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE promotion SET subject = #{subject}, imageFilename = #{imageFilename} WHERE promotionId = #{promotionId}
